attributes.title: Will destroy your device
attributes.review: Within 30 second of downloading and opening this app, my phone was fried. I wouldn’t be surprised if all my information was sent to the Chinese government right before it completely shut down.

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: Never downloaded this dumb app give it a one star rating if your gonna download it trump is the worse he is trying to shut down tiktok in USA and we are all sad about it but we won’t be when this app gets deleted pls give it a one star rating

attributes.title: Racist app
attributes.review: this app was racist to me and simply told me to go back to mexico. it also raped me and then didn’t take responsibility and ive heard this has happened to other people too. and now it is asking i download it after taking me out of every good extra curricular i do.

attributes.title: Useless trash
attributes.review: Downloaded this due to curiosity as to see if the so called “president” had anything helpful to offer. What a mistake that was. This app is pointless and should be deleted immediately. We should also delete him from the White House, so see y’all in November.

attributes.title: Best president ever🙄said no one ever
attributes.review: I wanted to see the big man in action all I got was a hot Cheeto girl 🍊🍊🍊running his mouth.🤢🤢 Very disappointed in the quality of the app too. Knowing he makes big bucks he can’t even make a proper app for users. 💩💩EMBARRASSINGGGGGGGGG. Anywho how does it feel knowing you have small dick energy😃🤡🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.title: Terrible 🤮
attributes.review: This app is trash 🗑 it is the worst app ever it was slow loading and it gave my phone a really bad virus I do not suggest. It drained my battery like crazy and is just a junk app. It’s only for people who like orange spray tanned pieces of trash. Would rather die than have this app on my phone.

attributes.title: Irresponsible and Corrupt
attributes.review: This App represents the common ignorance that is spread through bigotry and selfishness. The Cheeto-N-Chief has sullied the supposed highest office we have and has pushed this country securely in the bottom end of world development. We should be ashamed that this type of person was ever elected and given a hateful platform to preach upon.

attributes.title: This is disappointing
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it took 37 hours to download then when I went on it it crashed my phone for 4 days. I did it again then it crashed another 5 days. I think trump put a fire wall on my phone.

attributes.title: disgusting delete this ASAP!!
attributes.review: I am so utterly disgusted with this app. So many bugs and slow. What disgusted me the most is that Trumps face showed up on the screen! I almost threw up- no I did throw up. Do not download this app it just leaves you traumatized and have so much regret for even downloading it.

attributes.title: Racist & cheat
attributes.review: I hope history destroys you and your families name! How dare you threaten and bully people being the leader of the free world and not think judgement is coming for you! I voted for you in 2016 and I will never make that mistake again. I’ll make sure all my rep. Friends vote blue this time as well you trader!
